sentences: Marianne Schroeder (born 1949 in Reiden) is a Swiss pianist and composer.
Braxton & Stockhausen (hatART, 1984), with Garrett List, works by Anthony Braxton and Karlheinz Stockhausen (Klavierstücke VI–VIII)
Petra (Blank Forms Editions, 2019), with Stefan Tcherepnin, live recording of Petra, for two pianos (1991) by Maryanne AmacherWith the Groupe Lacroix
2003: 8 Pieces on Paul Klee together with the Ensemble Sortisatio (Creative Works Records)With Anthony Braxton
